features.tooltip: Add an unlimited number of ‘Works with Arcus’ devices from over 30 top brands
Conveniently control devices from anywhere using the Arcus iOS app, Android app, or Web Portal
Control your devices with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa
Unlimited video storage for a rolling time period, depending on your plan
Immediately receive notifications about what’s happening at home
Save time during your busy day by automating your devices
Have quick access to all your favorite devices
A record of all activity to understand what happens in your home

Get notified when a loved one’s daily routine has been disrupted, so you can take the necessary measures to keep them safe. A triggered Care behavior creates a silent alarm, notifying the whole family of events that are out of the ordinary
Real time visualization of alarm events in your home

Up to 7 days per month of continuous fast LTE service to keep you connected, even when your internet goes down. Requires 4G Modem. *Inactivity for more than 80 days will disable your cellular modem. Please refer to the Terms of Service for additional information
Full-service professional monitoring for burglary, smoke, fire and carbon monoxide, as well as panic alarms. Provided by an accredited and certified professional central monitoring station
